# preferredTransform

**Instance Property**

The track’s transform preference to apply to its visual content during presentation or processing.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredTransform: CGAffineTransform { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is typically, but not always, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGAffineTransformIdentity].
title: preferredTransform
